rep_input: Where do dose modifications fit on-label for common AEs?
model_output: For dose modifications related to common adverse events, refer to the specific section of the drug's Summary of Product Characteristics (SmPC) or European Public Assessment Report (EPAR). These documents will provide detailed guidance on how to adjust doses based on the type and severity of side effects. If you need specific information, please check these resources or let me know if you'd like the link sent by email.
